name: Stellar Night
description:
Stellar Night is a simple shooter game inspired by Towefall Ascension made for the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT gamejam.

Instructions:

  • AD to move
  • W to jump. 
  • Left Button of the mouse to shoot
  • R to Start or Restart the game

The beautiful tileset was made by Quintino Pixels and the sounds were made by Kenney and DOS88

UPDATE
Added an aim sprite for the mouse and changed the key used to restart the game.
